page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: Several main bus routes pas through our area. One of these routes run from Margam to the bus station in town centre .The other route runs from the station to Porthcawl. Besides these the town is one of the major stops on the National inter city route. Also just outside our area we have a Railway station in town,which is part of the main line service of the Swansea to London route which serves most of South Wales. Most people in our area own a car or have access to the public transport systems. Many people get together and hire a mini bus or a taxi to get back and forth from work.Also many children hire a mini bus to get back and forth from school.
